name: Scout Duty
description:
The work of a gunner is very difficult and you will soon realize how much. Help the rockets reach their target. Destroy enemy forces by aiming fire at them.

Scout Duty - Top Down View is a game in which you need to direct the attacks of allies behind enemy lines. Be careful not to get hit yourself. The victory of the allies depends on your work.

Game Features:
- Logic Walkthrough
- Beautiful Pixel Art
- Difficulty levels
- Pleasant musical accompaniment
